text: Centrochelys is a genus of tortoise. It contains one extant species and several extinct species: * Centrochelys atlantica * Centrochelys burchardi * Centrochelys marocana * Centrochelys robusta * Centrochelys vulcanica * Centrochelys sulcata (African spurred tortoise) == References == Category:Turtle genera Category:Taxa named by John Edward Gray Category:Testudinidae
title: Centrochelys
